options.query:
{{`SELECT *
FROM products
WHERE
    is_active = true
    AND (
        product_name ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        status ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        description ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        category ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%'
    )
ORDER BY id DESC;`}}
